website_summaries.verdict: An excellent training tool that quickly and effectively corrects behavior through sound.
pros: Loud hiss stops most dogs in their tracks
can be used for general training, barking, and no-go areas
cons: Should be used with care on aggressive or extremely fearful dogs
Well-behaved pets within earshot will also be “corrected

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: This product is rediculously overpircied and the size fits in my hand. Luckily to get about 20 puffs out of the thing.. buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Deb Habyan Geotis

customer_reviews.title: I got majorly screwed on this and not happy. How can they claim this is the same ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the same exact item as last year (saying on it while I was ordering that I ordered this lady on this date) when I got it, it was a completely different size! A lot smaller and almost double the cost. I got majorly screwed on this and not happy. How can they claim this is the same item when look at the size difference
customer_reviews.author: Gina K.

customer_reviews.title: Good Reminder Correction Tool
customer_reviews.text: I trained my puppy Labrador to sit, stay, heel. After I took him to the beach and let him run around, he "forgot" all about heeling. This did the trick. The nozzle amplifies sound, and they notice. You point it away from them but one loud blast (to them, it's not loud to a human) and he stopped pulling. After the first block of a few loud blasts, I could use short barely "hisses" and get him to correct. Expensive, works as a reminder tool, would get too expensive as a training tool unless your dog is actually afraid of this. This pup is not afraid of it, but he responds to it as a correction.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain View Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Stop the barking with no shocking
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical after a friend told me of this product but thought I'd try it. I have Shelties and barking is a serious issue. WOW! After spraying them a few times, just holding the can in my hand is enough to discourage the worst barker of the two. They no longer bark at the sweeper, when company comes and goes, when it's time to eat, etc. I'm certain it won't work for every situation but it worked for us. No collar, no shocking, nothing more heinous than a loss burst of air. I just bought two more cans to keep on hand.
customer_reviews.author: John O

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!! Buy it now!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW!!! Where has this been my whole life. I wish this stuff was around when I had pups in the past. This product is incredible! We have a new puppy and it's helped AMAZING with barking, biting, and begging. He's not scared of it but when he hears it, he certainly doesn't want to hear it more. I feel like it's completely safe and humane. It's just like when you clap but instead with the burst of air it's that sound that it seems dogs aren't a fan of. So, that makes me a fan for sure. A must buy when working on bad habits.
customer_reviews.author: Syl Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Huge improvement for my doggie.
customer_reviews.text: My little Shih Tzu was barking loudly and aggressively at other, usually larger, dogs and making our walks pretty miserable, at least for me. One of my neighbors told me that this product had solved his dogs barking problem and so I ordered it. My dog is almost cured of this aggressive barking. It has only been 3 days but I'm hopeful that this behavior problem has been corrected; it certainly has helped 100%. I read the directions several times and I watched a few instructional videos so that I would be ready. Now all I have to do is say "quiet" and show him the canister and quiets down totally.
customer_reviews.author: ukulelemaven

customer_reviews.title: If you are not morally opposed to a spray water bottle, go that route
customer_reviews.text: Initially this stuff worked like a charm. Just the sight of the can would make my dogs fall in line. My issues with it are: there isn't much "noise" in the can, it goes pretty quickly, so I have a hard time justifying the cost. Also, my dogs were desensitized to it fairly quickly. After getting the okay from the vet, I started using a spray water bottle when my crazed pup gets too worked up. It has worked a lot better and is much more cost efficient
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for leash aggression!
customer_reviews.text: We adopted an 8 yo Maltese with severe leash aggression. This worked great with the very first use. By the end of our walk we had passed two sets of dogs and he sat and kept his attention on me. One of the other dogs, who is also leash aggressive also sat. He was so amazed how all four of our dogs just sat and chilled while we talked about the canned air! The can is small enough to carry in the same hand as I hold their leashes. I am able to react very quickly when I see any signs of behavior I don't want on our walk.
customer_reviews.author: Beach Day

customer_reviews.title: Works... kinda?
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are definitely put off by it. I have two maltipoo dogs, a 1 year old and a 3 year old. They definitely don’t like the sound, but do they stop barking? My first few tries says no. Subsequent tries ... well, they know about the can and know I’m going to use it... but they still bark. The air runs out fast. My biggest complaint is the price of this. It’s basically a tiny can of compressed air and a custom nozzle. You can easily use a normal can of compressed air that you can get anywhere... but you have to modify the nozzle.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE AND HERE IS WHY!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I wasn’t sure how well this was going to work. But I am amazed! I have a 3 month old puppy and this thing does what it says. Corrects bad behavior! ***you don’t need to press hard. The smallest hiss of this can makes your dog stop. && on top of that saves you money so you don’t run out**** after a couple of hisses out of this can my dog sees it & knows to stop bad behavior I don’t even have to press on it. He just sees the red can and knows to stop! Always reward good behavior !
customer_reviews.author: Berenice Soto

customer_reviews.title: Great product, that does what it says!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really, really, works! My dog likes to bark a lot when someone is at the door. The VERY first time I used this, I sprayed it just once and he gave me that "what was that look?" and it stopped him in his tracks. It was did not frighten him, but rather just got his attention and he calmly laid his head back on his bed and was a little angel. I would recommend this to anyone that wants a humane method of training their dog.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia A

customer_reviews.title: super simple solution to some problem behaviors!
customer_reviews.text: Our little puppy jumped on us constantly when we brought him home and I didn't want us to spend our days telling him "off". While I was looking for "nice" solutions, I found this and decided to give it a try. Well, it does work! And, a couple tricks that worked for me...it is most effective if I use it without him seeing me use it and I try to use it strategically not constantly or he starts to ignore it.
customer_reviews.author: Daytona675

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work on Goldens
customer_reviews.text: Complete waste of money. Doesn't phase our 3 year old golden or others in the neighborhood. In fact, he gets excited and jumps for it when we pull out the red canister. Watched several YouTube videos to make sure we used it right and it simply doesn't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Elder

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I went to Amazon to purchase a furniture safe puppy chewing deterrent. What I got in this product is a horn blowing sound, extremely flammable, dangerous to children tool which I'm supposed to sit here and use whenever the puppy misbehaves. I DO NOT need a spray can to correct my puppy when I'm here. I can do that by making a loud noise, clapping my hands and saying "NO". What I needed is a safe but distasteful agent (like bitter lemon) to deter puppy from chewing on the furniture legs. WORST OF ALL it's completely NON-returnable......$21 dollars of useless. Great!!
customer_reviews.author: D Johnson

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to be something to spray on furniture so your dogs don’t chew on it so I was surprised it was actually just a hissing noise that comes out of it. I have two Chihuahuas and one boxer. The Chihuahuas are always yapping and yapping and barking and yapping. And my nine month old boxer is always getting into things and not listening. This pet corrector is God sent. I don’t even have to spray it anymore I just have to Pull the can out and they behave immediately. I bought one for every room in the house including the screened in pool area. Best stuff ever
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Best Thing Ever for Dog Training
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as described. It has changed our life as our dog, a lab mix, was always barking and jumping when someone came to the house. She now is very well behaved and responds to the commands "quiet" and "off' and "down". Be sure to praise when your dog responds. I carry one with me when I walk her and it has stopped other dogs from coming after her. I hold it behind my back and it's just a sound so there's nothing detrimental to your dog. This is the best thing ever for dog training. I hope whoever invented it makes a million dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Cheeco

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Amazon heading.  This is not a sour apple dog spray
customer_reviews.text: I gave this item a terrible review in another delivery if same item. The other delivery had no instructions. The present delivery did. I bought these items under my Amazon search for “Sour apple dog spray”. So I purchased it to spray on gladiolus my dogs were eating. It would not continue to spray and froze up. Turns out the directions made clear it was not a product to spray on items. So I ended up mistakenly buying 3 of these items. I fault Amazon for including this product under sour zapper dog spray.
customer_reviews.author: Lewes Jack

customer_reviews.title: This is PERFECT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a dog and a new kitten. They do not get along yet. My Zoe barks at an imaginary sound and Marty climbs on the kitchen counter. I tried motion-activated alarms and they scared my daughter and I. Every time we triggered the alarm, ear-splitting wails would occur. This product produces a hissing sound. Not loud, but menacing enough to say: Don't do that. Now all I have to do is pick up the container. The only downside is that you have to deploy it AFTER the behavior, but I keep a can in every room so I can be faster with the noise. Very humane.
customer_reviews.author: books-aholic60

customer_reviews.title: I don't like the idea of paying for canned air but it's ...
customer_reviews.text: Creates a hissing sound that will startle your dog. Comes with instructions and a bit of training expertise owners can really benefit from. I don't like the idea of paying for canned air but it's more pressurized than a bottle of air-duster, which is why it works well to stave off the annoying bark. I have two yappy dogs and this works pretty well. It's mostly about ME remembering where I put it, remembering to bring it with when going on walks, etc...but after going through almost the entire can all I need to do now is imitate the hissing sound and it usually quiets my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: MPetty

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: The dogs next door bark at me incessantly when I’m in the back yard. For years I have just put up with it. I saw this and thought I’d give it a try and couldn’t be more pleased. Those dogs go right back into their house when I give Pet Corrector a squirt. I love that it doesn’t harm the dogs, but makes them go away!!
customer_reviews.author: kaymaydit

customer_reviews.title: Used at the right time, it works!
customer_reviews.text: We have two 4 month old yorkie puppies and I've only had to use this a few times because they sure hate it! One short blast lets out a nasty HISS that has stopped them from yapping. The key I think is timing and not over using it: dog barks, I get near by and spray it once followed by a firm verbal NO, they're startled and don't want to hear *that* again! Now if they see the can they're starting to associate it with that scary sound. Using it too often for every type of bad puppy behavior would probably make dogs immune so I'm only using it for inappropriate barking. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Effective and cost effective.
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to think this actually would be effective, but to my surprise it did! It is a cheap and easy way to curb unwanted behavior from your pet. After only two uses, my dogs will not engage in the behavior I wanted to change. I’m glad I followed the recommendation by fellow dog owners at my local dog park. No need for painful shock collars or stinky citronella.
customer_reviews.author: Elwood

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for puppy training
customer_reviews.text: We’re using this to help stop my puppy from biting the kids ankles. It does work, the kids spay the can which gives a loud air noise and our puppy immediately stops biting. All we have to do is grab the can and she recognizes it and stops before needing to spray. We purchased the smaller size but we need the larger size so we don’t run out of air spays. We also tried a water bottle which works too, but we were having to spray her with water more than once. This air can works better.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had this product long ago
customer_reviews.text: We adopted two dogs from the shelter that came with behavior issues. We have tried scolding, the barking collars and spray water bottles to no avail. As soon as the hiss bottle arrived, we had occasion to quiet barking dogs for delivery man that followed. OMG, it works!!!! They were immediately distracted by the noise and instantly quiet. I cannot believe that this works that well. We now feel like we can began enjoy these pets without the bad behavior. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Piano Lady

customer_reviews.title: very little product.
customer_reviews.text: The product was a joke, all it did was a quick puff of air. I gave it a try through 2 containers and It was nothing but compressed air with a little noise.
customer_reviews.author: Jomando

customer_reviews.title: I've been using this product for some time now
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for some time now. There are a lot of complaints about the amount of "sprays" you get. I say whatever to that. It depends how long the spurts are. What I do know is that after using this consistently for correcting certain behavior, I just have to say the command and show my dog the can and he behaves. I like the small cans for walking the dog and the larger can for the house. But again, it's how you use the product.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Don

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product pretty much knowing it may not work on my doggies. Noise doesn’t bother one of them who runs towards fireworks. Sure enough it did not work, but I'm giving this four stars because although it did not work on my doggies, next door to me right under my bedroom window lives a big German Shepard who barks continuously. I spayed this noise and he stopped barking immediately and ran into his dog house. Now when he starts his morning barking at the children walking to school, one spray and he’s done. He doesn’t even know where it’s coming from. He looks around and retreats. Excellent product for people who don’t have insane doggies.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Just have to try it - not for all dogs
customer_reviews.text: It's not a matter of value, effectiveness or recommendation because all dogs react differently. I have 3 dogs of which 2 sometimes need to be corrected. My 2 dogs react differently and one of them disregarded the Pet Corrector after 2 days and the other dog runs when it sees the spray can. My comment is that since it is harmless to the dogs and if it works it is worthwhile. You just have to try it to see how your dog responds. My comment is not meant to be either negative or non-recommending - just that you can't tell ahead of time what the results will be.
customer_reviews.author: Mountainrich

customer_reviews.title: No fear training
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful training tool for our cairn terrier! One spray and she'd stop (insert bad behavior here) and look at me - brain reset...awaiting command. It only took a couple of corrections for her to get with the program. I rarely need to use it anymore. And reinforcing good behavior is an important component with any training, of course.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes that this would work. Instead of shocking mine silent, it makes them bark more! It seems to make them angry. I have 4 Chihuahuas that bark at everything, including me. I have tried everything to try and train them not to do that, but so far nothing has worked. This didn’t either. My dogs could be abnormal and don’t react the way most dogs do. Constant barking, can really get on your nerves! It’s a good thing I live in a rural area.
customer_reviews.author: Horselover

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works as demo
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works like the demo said. Just sound the horn when your pet need immediate correction and she will step back and very likely not doing the same thing again. My puppy loves to jump on me and chew my toes when I come home, after a couple of corrections, she stopped this behavior for good. The hissing sound seems to speak to her. And odor come out of it is not offensive, if your nose is so sensitive, you can smell it but unlikely. Just point the bottle to a clear area and not directly over your pet.
customer_reviews.author: 1Tea8uyer

customer_reviews.title: It's a dud. Does not startle. Does not phase. Does not distract.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product hoping it would help break my dog out of his fixation with other dogs when out on walks. The plan was, as soon as those ears go up and he starts to whine, I would spray the Corrector and then offer a treat. The spray doesn't even distract or bother the dog. It is no better than just making a sharp "shhhh" or "chhhhh" sound. Not only can I not recommend this product, I am unable to see a situation in which it would be useful for any dog. Better off sticking with training a word like "here" that always gets a treat reward. In summary, this device is a total and absolute dud.
customer_reviews.author: HappyMisanthrope

customer_reviews.title: Using this on my cat
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat that has been"marking" areas around the house since we got a new kitten. He's been checked out by the vet and is fine. He had some tests done to make sure he was healthy. I've caught him spraying in one area and used this. After the second time he stopped spraying there. He still sprays in a couple areas, but that has even slowed down. He hates the sound of it. Luckily I haven't had to use it much. He sees the can in my hand and he stops doing what ever he's not supposed to be doing.
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This has worked so well that as soon as my dogs see me pick it up they stop barking. Hasn't kept me from buying second one, though. I take it when I go on my alone walk and it effectively handles the dogs that run up to their fence lines ready to kill people passing by. I reach in my pocket and give a little sound squirt and they stop dead in their tracks..
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great product for correcting behavior; aim carefully!
customer_reviews.text: I need to order more. This is the ONLY thing that stops my Maltese from anxiety barking. We were taking her on a trip and I sure didn't want her barking her head off at everyone she saw. Verbally correcting her was useless. This got her attention and worked like magic. Be very careful that you don't spray it AT the dog or anyone else! My boyfriend was carrying it in his pocket and leaned over, pushing the nozzle, and burned his leg when it sprayed on him. It would be nice if it had a safety nozzle, like pepper spray does. I imagine there have been quite a few accidental injuries with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Armand90

customer_reviews.title: great idea
customer_reviews.text: It worked for a few times when my dog was barking but then she just tuned it out. She is awful when she see's people or dogs while we're walking or at the park. she loves everybody & wants to say "hello" but her high pitched bark is so awful most people just want to get away! I tried Pet Corrector because it worked for a friend but it did not work for us. Different breed of dog might be the reason. Also it says not to put it in your pocket without the cap on,so it's really awkward to get it out of your pocket & use it when you need it.
customer_reviews.author: on time

customer_reviews.title: Humane dog training (to be combined with positive reinforcement)
customer_reviews.text: After hiring an expensive dog trainer, trying vibrating bark collars, I finally received a recommendation from a neighbor to try this to help my rid my dog of his bad barking habit. And guess what, it worked! Mind you, it's important to have it be accompanied by positive reinforcement, like giving my dog treats when he is silent, or trying to redirect him with a treat before using the spray. But the spray has definitely made a big difference!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia L. Way

customer_reviews.title: Maybe a lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: When our pup showed a desire to chase truck, I knew it could be a life or death issue, even on a quiet street. I found tht the noise of the compressed air, as be began to run dwon the driveway, broke his concentration, he looked back, and obeyed my stop command. Without it, he would hav ebeen hyper-focused and would end up in pursuit. I am working on using it to stop door charging now, you spray the air, not the dog, it is the sound which breaks that obsessive acts, and then he is diverted long enough to hear the command you give.
customer_reviews.author: 60gram

customer_reviews.title: It really helps!
customer_reviews.text: This really helps to stop the barking. It's so loud that' it's startling to our dogs, which gets their attention and focus off of barking enough that I can talk to them about no barking. Now all I have to do most of the time is show our dogs the red sprayer can and they back away from barking! I plan on taking it with us in the motorhome.
customer_reviews.author: J.K.

customer_reviews.title: Yay! Finally something that tames my dog.
customer_reviews.text: Thank you! Something that finally keeps my dog in check. I don't even have to push it anymore she just sees the bottle and immediately will run to the back door and sit like a good girl until I tell her it's OK to come back and then she's all settled. I only pushed this 2 times. I've tried so many things again thank you for something affordable and simple.
customer_reviews.author: JenDelRio:)

customer_reviews.title: This is a good option for nervous dogs
customer_reviews.text: This is a good option for nervous dogs; I got ultrasound device and my dog got sick and couldn't eat for two days then I have used this other product and works much better, of course, needs to be consistent otherwise dogs are like little kids they will back to the bad habits :). I like it and will recommend it;
customer_reviews.author: Any

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Product doesn't work. My intention in purchasing this was to get my puppy and the dog next door to stop barking and jumping on the fence. Didn't faze either dog and they're different breeds.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: My sweet, lovable, usually obedient pit mix dogs get into Cujo mode whenever my neighbors bite-sized yappy dogs come out in the yard and my neighbors don't care. They won't come when called, I use to have to grab their leash and drag them back inside. I used this once from about 10 feet away sprayed away from them, they both stopped immediately and come to me. I keep this by the door to my yard now, it is much easier to grab than trying to leash 55 and 70 lbs dogs and drag them.
customer_reviews.author: Cloo

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: The small size can will fit easily into a pocket when out walking pets. Having 2 reactive dogs I can say this works. Sometimes it takes 2 sprays to correct one of my dogs. The sound isn't loud but it's enough to startle them quickly to interrupt their racing mind to hear me correct them. I personally feel that air is more humane than a squirt bottle of water as one of mine is afraid of it. My only complaint is the price for a little air.
customer_reviews.author: A. Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works to break counter-surfing
customer_reviews.text: This worked great to stop my Springer Spaniel from counter-surfing. I mostly use positive techniques but I have 3 kids so there are frequently crumbs or wrappers or crusts or something on a counter so she was constantly rewarded for her surfing. I hide the can and hiss it if she surfs. She improved immediately. I also occasionally use it if she steals something super high value and runs instead of “drop it.” As I said, I hide it behind my back so it’s like God has seen her naughty behavior and is chastising her.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the other one, but not bad.
customer_reviews.text: I have previously purchased "Stop That!" pet correction spray and loved it. It has pheromones and a light scent. This doesn't have either, but I knew that when I decided to buy it. The other product worked amazingly well on my pack of yapping Yorkies. This doesn't seem to have the same effect. They still don't care for the sound, but they don't react as strongly to this spray as they did the other one. I think the sound from the other one was a little "fiercer" or maybe louder.
customer_reviews.author: B. Pearce

customer_reviews.title: This product is cheaper than dog obedience training!
customer_reviews.text: I was so skeptical about this product. I have 4 dogs, but one of them, Aussie/Lab with bad behavior that have been difficult for me to handle. I took him to obedience training twice after failure of other methods. He is a great obedient dog at the training school, but not at home. When any guests, especially his ex dog sitter, arrive/leave, he barks insanely. Of course, if one starts, all 4 bark. Finally, I decide to find another solution, not training. When his favorite person, ex dog sitter, came, I used it. It worked great! His dog sitter was amazed. Since I never have any chance to use it, again. Hope it still work.
customer_reviews.author: Chaco

customer_reviews.title: Excellent training tool!
customer_reviews.text: This is brilliant. My dogs are very well behaved and have a good training foundation but our new home is surrounded by dogs that bark incessantly all day. My three eventually can't resist and respond, barking in unison in the house. One quick press of the button and no more barking!! What a great tool and I appreciate the pamphlet that comes with it gives good training advice on the best way to use it. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: S. Spruill

customer_reviews.title: Works great on my kitty.
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought Pet Corrector for my dog, but she learns so well I didn't really need it. Then I got her a kitten. I've used it successfully for the kitty on many occasions, primarily for using her claws on anything other than the scratching post, and it works amazingly well. It does such a good job of stopping her clawing my rugs & furniture i don't need to consider declawing.
customer_reviews.author: Dawnie Gee

customer_reviews.title: Good but small volume and expensive
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It really helps me control my puppy Beagle's bad behaviors: howling, chewing, general, and attacking our older Chihuahua. My only concern is that one bottle lasts about 2 days for us. Yes, we have a demon puppy, and it's working to curb these behaviors, but the price for the volume is not good. I'm gonna look for a another similar, but cheaper option as it really does work.
customer_reviews.author: Lupo

customer_reviews.title: Stops my skittish dog in her tracks!
customer_reviews.text: Does the trick- now my skittish dog stops barking once she even hears me open the cap! It’s just compressed air but I like how it’s in a conveniently small can that can fit in your pocket on walks. I try not to spray it when my other dog who doesn’t it is too close because it’ll startle her for no reason but I can see it could be especially useful on walks where you might encounter an aggressive off leash dog or even a coyote. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: T. Arrogante

customer_reviews.title: We're impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I can't rave enough about how effective the Pet Corrector spray has been for us! We have a 3yo English Bulldog who can be very difficult to discipline. Generally, she's very well behaved, but she, like most dogs, has her triggers. We've been working on things like her escalating behavior when someone knocks at the front door, this has been a total game changer! She immediately backs away and small spurts keep her in check when she wants to break back into her nutty behavior. I'm impressed. Already bought two more cans!
customer_reviews.author: J.Savage

customer_reviews.title: Works sometimes, runs out fast
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 dogs that bark at the mailman, etc. I’ve been using the spray consistently for about 2 weeks now. It got their attention immediately but now they seem to get getting used to it. Sometimes it work but sometimes it doesn’t. I’m going to keep trying but the downside is these run out fast. It’s just compressed air so it’s a shame it’s so expensive for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: It really works. It stops the action(or get the ...
customer_reviews.text: It really works. It stops the action(or get the immediate attention of the dog) and after I used 3~4 times at the behavior correction(excessive barking), I don't have to use this but just make a hiss sound with my mouth and works the same way. i just don't understand why it is so expensive? It is just the compressed "air" in the bottle,,,,rip of in that sense.
customer_reviews.author: maya

customer_reviews.title: Worked for my pups
customer_reviews.text: I tried other methods before a friend suggested this. My main reason was to stop barking. My rescue is a Papillon Mix and barks at EVERYTHING, nonstop. No kidding. Then my Shihtzu gets all crazy from his barking. I use this with a clicker. My hope is to phase this and transition to clicker only and then to just the command. So far it’s worked very well and I’m barely using it. They listen once I use the clicker. It’s still early but it’s promising for now!
customer_reviews.author: Phanessa

customer_reviews.title: Great product---does the job----my dog was a barker and after ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product---does the job----my dog was a barker and after two sprays she stopped her barking. I did say quit it and gave her a treat after each encounter. It was a miracle!!! I carry it now with me on our walks and all I have to do now is show her the can and there is not a sound from her. Now mind you, this dog is 8 years old and I recently obtained her---so let me relay to you, you can teach an old dog new behavior. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary J Castle

customer_reviews.title: Bingo! A picture speaks a thousand words! Lol!
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 miniature poodles and the 2 older ones bark incessantly for the most stupid reasons....like my husband sighing or our daughter walking into the room....the list goes on! It’s ridiculous and very stressful in our, otherwise, peaceful home. I’ve tried bark collars, spray collars, whistles, and spray bottles and none of these came NEAR working as well as Pet Corrector! I’m amazed I only had to spray twice yesterday evening and it put them in their place! It was SO nice and quiet here last night! Now, I think all I have to do is pick up the can! Just look at Willy’s face! Lol!
customer_reviews.author: C. Whelan

customer_reviews.title: This really works!
customer_reviews.text: Pet correct works wonders for my wire fox terrier! She had bad habit of jumping up on people but when I press the button and the hiss comes out she immediately stops, same thing happens when she gets after our cat, one press and she stops. I think this would be a great thing to carry on walks in case a stray dog came after you. I will definitely repurchase this item and recommend it to everyone who is training their dog.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Miracle for my excessive barker
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so much! I have a very yappy dog (American Eskimo) that I got when he was a year old. He had no training and was set in many bad habits. With A LOT of patience, I was able to break him of everything but the barking. Once he hears something, there is no breaking his focus, except with this can. Nothing shuts him up faster or more consistently. I don't even have to use it most of the time, just picking it up is enough.
customer_reviews.author: SaraJean Panek

customer_reviews.title: Miracle in a can!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe that a simple can of air is the miracle that I'd been praying for! I have two dogs that get very excitable - they jump up on people who enter and bark - a lot! We have tried the spray bottle with water and even tried the collar that beeps and buzzes. (I only use the beeping function, because I didn't like their reaction to the buzz). This stops their behavior dead in their tracks. Now I only have to say "Pfft" or hold the can. They are getting it for the barking. I haven't tried it for the jumping yet - we haven't had visitors.
customer_reviews.author: KJChard

customer_reviews.title: This is dumb
customer_reviews.text: Yeah sure it'll work, if you can afford to keep buying it while working towards correcting whatever behavior you bought it for. For me I was super excited. But when I realized it would take longer than one bottle to correct the nipping behavior I was focused on I decided to move onto better options. Honestly just making the noise with your throat works just as effectively.
customer_reviews.author: Gift Card

customer_reviews.title: Great for Emergencies
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a an alternative to Excessive force at work when dealing with customers dogs, I would rather use this than pepper spray someones dog. It is also great to use instead of shouting at the dog park when disagreements break out. It is great to startle the dogs long enough for everyone escape and or to grab their best friend and make sure no one is hurt. Also great to momentarily stop excessive barking by the rowdy bunch if need be.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Complete silence finally!
customer_reviews.text: We love our babies we really do! Except for first thing in the morning when they are excited about us getting up and feeding them and taking them outside! Not really the best thing to wake up to. 6 yorkie/chorkies yapping in excitement while we are trying to find our house shoes and all their food bowls. No more! When I get up(no matter what time that ends up being) it's silent. My dogs DO NOT want me to pull out the little red can! It scares the snot outta them but finally something gets their attention!
customer_reviews.author: Kami Bennett

customer_reviews.title: On the fence about this one, it does what ...
customer_reviews.text: On the fence about this one, it does what it says it will do and you get quite a few squirts out of the bottle but my dog lost interest in it, it merely redirects her thoughts for a minute but doesn't curb the behavior anymore. At first it did seem to work but once she got used to it she doesn't really care if you spray it anymore. Also I felt it was a little pricey for what it is but depending on the dog it might work, just didn't work for us.
customer_reviews.author: Courtleightx

customer_reviews.title: Truly amazing stuff that truly works even better than I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: I was astounded by this product. I used it with my "Little Miss Barky-barky Pembroke Corgi" one time by pointing it to the ground a foot away from her. ONE TIME! Now all I have to do is just show her the can in my hand and the barking comes to an instant halt. I am so loving this product. I am retired and spend 90% of my time at home with my pets so my dog's barking was really driving me nuts. I don't know how or why this product works so well but I thank my lucky stars that someone invented it. This stuff is great!
customer_reviews.author: AnimalLvr

customer_reviews.title: Pet Corrector is AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have a small dog who we were unable to walk around the neighborhood due to his barking and running after other dogs, people and animals. This product was recommended to us and it corrected the behavior in one day. We always keep a bottle but only need to use it once or twice a month at this point. We've recommended it to other people in the neighborhood just with the change in behavior of our pet.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Brehm

customer_reviews.title: Wow. This works!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my two little dogs, but they were incessant barkers. Anyone in the next yard or on the sidewalk would set off a ton of yipping. This spray makes a "whoose" noise that grabs their attention. You still have to work on the training and commands, but this is so very helpful. All my neighbors are amazed at the change in our pups!
customer_reviews.author: Penny B.

customer_reviews.title: REALLY loud. Definitely does the trick, but my ...
customer_reviews.text: REALLY loud. Definitely does the trick, but my cat yowls at night (we have a tomcat that comes through the yard and they get into yowling matches), so the point is to make the house quieter so my roommate and I can sleep. This can is louder than my cat though. Short term tradeoff between really loud blast and silence for a few hours is worth it, but I found a can from a different company (I believe it was sentry) that is slightly smaller and quieter and still does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: CollegeDormLife

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Our toy schnauzer barks constantly at anything and everyone which is very annoying when you have people over. This has worked amazing I don't even have to hit the nozzle very hard and she stops and now if I grab the can she doesn't bark, thank you this has been a life saver for us! Highly recommend this to anyone who has a barking problem
customer_reviews.author: Laura M. Hale

customer_reviews.title: Works great and causes no harm.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! No harm to pet but 'puts them on notice'. I've had great results correcting my cat at home (all I have to do is pick this up and she scampers away) and at the animal shelter where I walk large dogs. If they get mouthy or jump up on me, a quick little press (not even the full blast) solves the problem. I'll have this on hand as long as I have pets or handle large dogs!
customer_reviews.author: dmatus4NCAS

customer_reviews.title: Mine lasted a few seconds
customer_reviews.text: I consider this to be a waste of money unless you truly only expect to get a few seconds of use out of it. It is not returnable or refundable in any way, as Amazon just informed me. It is possible that the one I received was incomplete/not quite full when I received it. I'm not really sure. But I did expect to get more than three seconds from a $12 item.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: This really works!!! Seriously!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing!!!! It was recommended by a friend. My 9 month old puppy was trying to be the boss and taking over the house. The butting was the worst. I only had to use the spray less than a handful of times and “WOW” it was like magic. She instantly stopped and looked at me. I follow it with positive reinforcement and repeat thing like “no biting, kiss” or “no barking.” I only have to point at the drawer where I keep it and she stops to listen to my command. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Carino

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product to keep on hand while out walking the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to keep on hand while out walking the dogs. Used correctly (A quick and sharp spray) it will deter stray dogs or stop your own dogs unwanted behavior. The trick is to compress all the way and fast and keep it out of sight so your dog doesn't really know where it came from. It works!
customer_reviews.author: Beachbound

customer_reviews.title: Great training tool!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as recommended by my brother and it’s one of the best dog-training tools if you have a dog that’s jumping up on things or people, or that barks too much, or displays other behaviors you might be having trouble correcting. It’s never meant to be aimed at the dog, but sprayed near him or her. They don’t like the sound and it’ll interrupt the behavior-literally stopping them in their tracks, long enough for you to tell them to ‘Stop That!’ After the first couple of times of using it, we’ve only had to show him the bottle and he behaves much better. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Anne R.

customer_reviews.title: It works! 100%!
customer_reviews.text: This amazing spray has fixed our dog, Mr. Bear! He and I went on a long walk today! He began to bark at cyclists, walkers, children and a beagle...but to no avail! I spritzed a bit of that spray and voila! - he never completed his bark! That’s right! Mama is in charge! I hope it helps your pups! 🐶🐶🐶💗💗
customer_reviews.author: EmmiePf

customer_reviews.title: Great training tool
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product....stops them dead in their tracks. Stops barking, aggression, any bad behavior with only a blast of air....who knew!!! The can is the bad guy, your not!! All they know is that the red can makes a noise they don't like. No pain, no hitting, no harsh words.....just a blast of air...fantastic, cured my chihuahua of aggression, and barking. He is a perfect gentleman now.
customer_reviews.author: MS Sam

customer_reviews.title: This actually works - but you can make the same sound with your mouth...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this, discovered it worked WONDERS on the dog. Was STUNNING the effect that it had on his bad behavior. I can't give enough credit for this. But we also learned you can make the same sound yourself for free. So try it if you like and be amazed. Or just hiss loudly at your dog and also be amazed. Your call.
customer_reviews.author: Jay B.

customer_reviews.title: Good training aid
customer_reviews.text: We had a small issue with our dog and feeding time. We started putting him outside on the patio, while we prepare his food. Of course he started barking and barking because he knew what we were doing! We used the spray with the phrase “no barking” and it worked. It took about four times, and now if he starts to bark we just show him the spray! But now he barks very little if at all. This is a gentle way to correct behavior problems with your pet.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnie

customer_reviews.title: I think that this item would be best listed as a defense product for people walking or ...
customer_reviews.text: Item listing did not explain that this item was non returnable. I got it to dissuade my dogs from barking at my horse and sheep. One hiss from this canister and all the animals wildly and dangerously scattered without looking for safe exits. I think that this item would be best listed as a defense product for people walking or riding bikes to chase off aggressive dogs. My biggest issue was that it was not returnable....that should be clearly stated in the listing.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Seibert

customer_reviews.title: Like Magic for Stopping Barking!  🐶
customer_reviews.text: Both my small dogs bark when they hear someone come to the front door but they stop when they hear the ssssttttt sound from my Pet Corrector! When I take them for their walk, one of them barks if he sees other dogs walking toward him. One press of the Pet Corrector and the barking stops!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara KTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Allowed us to keep our dog
customer_reviews.text: We were almost ready to give our dog away and thought we would give this product a try. The fighting between our dogs immediately stopped with the spray of this item. All of the growling and barking and unwanted behavior immediately stops with the spray of this product thank you for allowing us to keep a dog.
customer_reviews.author: william sarlitto

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: The sound works well as a correction for my dog when she continues behaviors after multiple verbal reminders. I've used it 3 times now, over the course of about a week, and the most recent time I barely had to press the button. The smallest sound from this thing and she was completely done trying to dig a hole in the couch.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Over priced small cans
customer_reviews.text: I’m unimpressed for the price... had I known it was literally compressed air I would not have purchased it. It is effective but I’ll just get compressed air next time for much less money. Great learning experience and it works but really and truly... a bigger can for the price would nice
customer_reviews.author: KWright

customer_reviews.title: Great for puppy training
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my puppy was biting everyone. I sprayed it every time he tried to bite me and it worked great! Only took 3 times. However, I also used it on my chihuahua to try to get her to stop barking at the door every time someone walked by but it did not work as well for her. I still always keep a bottle on hand. It’s a great product. My only complaint is that the bottle is small and it doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done, but...
customer_reviews.text: This product works just as described; press the button and it produces a loud Cesar Milan "CCHHHH" sound. However, my friend pointed out that a water bottle for .99 at Walmart works just as well. So we didn't reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Recommended to me by my dog trainer
customer_reviews.text: Recommended to me by my dog trainer. Used appropriately, is a perfect training aid! I also can set this can next to any food left out within reach of my People-food-loving pup, and he won't go anywhere near it, just seeing the can there! This is a re-order and my last 2 cans lasted me easily a couple of years... One quick correction with the hissing noise this makes, and done! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: I have two happy Yorkie that love to bark at everything when we ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a miracle worker. I have two happy Yorkie that love to bark at everything when we are walking. It was getting to where I hated to go. For our walks. A friend suggested this and I ordered it that day. The very first time I used it they both stopped barking and turned and looked at me. Now all I have to say is no barking, they stop barking and sit by my feet for their treat. The female still needs a spray now and then when her nemesis is near by, but the walks are so enjoyable now. Best product ever, I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi

customer_reviews.title: Stubborn beagle
customer_reviews.text: This worked a few times for my beagle, but now he just doesn't care for it. We used it on walks because he can get really loud when he sees other dogs. Now when I use it, he just turns to me and barks.. I'll continue to use it until the bottle runs out but I'm not sure I'll buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Works well for a few short bursts
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product because our dog doesn't seem to mind loud noises. We had tried the penny shaker and other tools. This worked really well the first few times but then she didn't care anymore. That is my dog and not a reflection of the product. It did work well the first few times as a deterrent. Whey I went with 4 stars is that it didn't really give that many bursts of air. It ran out very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewerofStuff

customer_reviews.title: A great “Pssssst” to stop unwanted behavior
customer_reviews.text: This product has effectively helped curtail our puppy’s unwanted behaviors. One or two uses to stop unwanted behavior has worked almost every time. She now sees me reach for the canister and self regulates her behavior. It “nipped in the bud” behavior that was a nuisance before it became a habit.
customer_reviews.author: L. Clark

customer_reviews.title: This is a great to use for that purpose
customer_reviews.text: We have a 1 1/2 year old basset hound/lab mix. We live in an apartment with lots of people coming and going and we don't want him barking when someone goes by our door. This is a great to use for that purpose. He has almost completely stopped barking because this startles him so much. Much better than using a shock collar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maybe 6 sprays and you’re done
customer_reviews.text: Runs out SUPER quick! The noise does startle the dogs, it’s a low hissing noise, but you can’t even spray two or three times consecutively because the cab gets FREEZING cold and seized up. Literally maxes you out after two sprays until it warms back up again. I do *not* recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie H.

customer_reviews.title: Works the Best
customer_reviews.text: My dog's trainer recommended this product. It's nice because when used correctly, my dog doesn't realize the "blast of air" is coming from me. She thinks it happens when she engages in bad behavior (ie. digging holes in the yard). I would recommend this for any dog owner.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!  Oh, Wow!!  Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This has REALLY worked for my 4 mos, female, Lab puppy, who has been very hard to train on the jumping up on ppl & barking at us for attention. Although it scares her, it has gotten her attention when nothing else has. So, I’d definitely recommend this product to any dog owners whom have any negative behaviors that need retraining out of.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product,  pay attention to product volume or be ripped off
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, I’ve been using it training my large breed fear aggressive puppy while training and around the house, to break up spats between dogs and for barking. The money it cost for the amount of product you get is almost highway robbery. It’s a wonderful product just pay attention to the ounces.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Moon

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really works!
customer_reviews.text: I only had to actually use this product a couple of times. Now, all I do is SHOW my dogs the can, and they immediately stop barking. You must be careful to not do it too close to them, or to your ears as the noise it emits is quite loud and they do not like it. In this photo I never pushed the button, as this would be an unsafe distance. The photo demonstrates how my dog quiets down when I show him the red can. It's miraculous. I ordered 4 cans to have in every room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I found the REAL product at the local Winn Dixie, the can looks identical to the picture in the advertisement and it worked well. This stuff is different. You can see the spray like a white foam, and the can gets freezing cold if you spray it too much. I've barely used it and it feels like its about empty. It doesn't make quite the same sound so it doesn't work as well. But I guess it still kinda gets my dogs attention. I'm disappointed in the faulty advertising.
customer_reviews.author: kristen trusley

customer_reviews.title: Depends on your dog
customer_reviews.text: The success of this product will likely depend on the personality of your dog. I have a lab mix who is very submissive and a blue heeler... none of them are submissive. This worked great for my lab, who isn't the dog I was trying to get to behave...he already does... My blue heeler would just look at me, tilt his head, and continue being stubborn... The only thing that has worked for him is water. Just like people, not all dogs are the same, so if this doesn't work for your dog it doesn't make it a bad product it just means that your dog needs a different method of training.
customer_reviews.author: Chic-n-fit

customer_reviews.title: Probably saved me loads of money in replacing my fence
customer_reviews.text: My dog had bad fence aggression and with a vinyl picket fence i was just nervously waiting for it to snap or crack when he jumped on it to bark at other dogs. Then came this product. It only took about two weeks before my dog stopped this bad habit and my anxiety of taking him in the backyard was gone. The only thing I wish it had was a holder so it can be worn around your wrist for fast easy access when you need it. While training him it was annoying to have to keep it in my hand if I had to do other things.
customer_reviews.author: Micaela

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for my dog!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 cans of the pet corrector and I have used both cans and my dog's behavior improves a small fraction if he knows I am spraying, but as soon as I put it away, he goes back to his normal behavior...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: The Company of Animals Pet Corrector
product_meta.description: Size:50 ml - 2 packHelp retrain unwanted behaviors like jumping up barking food stealing and place training with Pet Corrector Pet Corrector is favorited by pet parents and dog trainers worldwide and has become a must-have for retraining bad habits like excessive barking and jumping up Pet Corrector works by emitting a harmless hiss sound that mimics warning sounds found from other animals like snakes geese racoons and other animals This sound interrupts their actions and gives time to help retrain "quiet" "no jump" and "no barking" techniques We love our dogs so training them humanely is important Pet Corrector is a positive and respectful way to interrupt bad habits & retrain positive actions for peace of mind around the house and in public When training to prevent excessive dog barking or to stop your dogs from barking at strangers we suggest using Pet Corrector in short bursts and never pointing Pet Corrector at your dog or aiming Pet Corrector at a place on your body Pet Corrector is strongly discouraged for use with Puppies and should be used at a safe distance from your dog- never to be pointed directly at your dog or close in proximity to their body
feature_bullets: STOPS BARKING Help train your dog to stop excessive barking with Pet Corrector Pet Corrector works by emitting a harmless hiss of air to interrupt barking & help you train "no bark" & other useful training commands

HISS SOUND Pet Corrector retrains dog behaviors by emitting a hiss sound mimicking natural warning sounds that cats & other animals make This interrupts actions and allow you to retrain habits like jumping up & barking

GREAT FOR DOG TRAINING We love our dogs so training them humanely is important Pet Corrector is a constructive & positive way to interrupt bad habits & retrain better behaviors for peace of mind around the house & in public

USES PER CAN Pet Corrector can be sprayed or used in general correlation to the can size For 50ml cans Pet Corrector can be used about 50 times Pet Corrector is best used in short bursts & should never be pointed at a dog

SAFETY FIRST Pet Corrector is not recommended for use with Puppies and should never be pointed directly at a dog nor any part near your body Pet Corrector is not a toy and should be used only by adults and professionals

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
